title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option does not always work as expected. When following the steps below, the action does not have any effect:
OB:
1. Create a new file called f1.txt. 
2. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
EB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all open files that have been saved should be closed.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Generate build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 
2. Open multiple files. 
3. Save changes in some of the open files. 
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. 
Expected behavior: All open files that have been saved should be closed.
